column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Aang says : " Momo , marbles please .
#Text=" Aang says : " You did n't even look .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's great !
#Text=" Aang says : " But I 'm not doing it now .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Stop bugging her , airhead .
#Text=You need to give girls space when they do their sewing .
#Text=" Katara says : " What does me being a girl have to do with sewing ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Simple .
#Text=Girls are better at fixing pants than guys and guys are better at hunting and fighting and stuff like that .
#Text=It 's just the natural order of things .
#Text=" Katara says : " All done with your pants !
#Text=And look what a great job I did !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Wait !
#Text=I was just kidding .
#Text=I ca n't wear these !
#Text=Katara , please !
#Text=" Aang says : " Relax , Sokka .
#Text=Where we 're going , you wo n't need any pants .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We just made a pit stop yesterday .
#Text=Should n't we get a little more flying done before we camp out ?
#Text=" Katara says : " He 's right .
#Text=At this rate , we wo n't get to the North Pole until spring .
#Text=" Aang says : " But Appa 's tired , are n't you boy ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I said , are n't you boy ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , that was real convincing .
#Text=Still , hard to argue with a ten - ton magical monster .
#Text=" Aang says : " Look !
#Text="
